item.title: 【General Music Discussion】Various Artists Compilations
item.description:
I don't see anyone posting a thread about this, so I will ask...

Is anyone interested on Various Artists Compilations? For example:

1. Various – The Millennium Collection (The Best Of Pop Music Of The 20th Century) (I have the complete 10 volumes)
2. One Shot 80's (I have the complete 20 Volumes)

...and many more.

I love music and all... But it's disheartening if I will post it and then no one's going to pay an attention.
item.author: olobersykes99
